title: The Gervasoni Family Estate: life in the Yandoit houses
creator_credit: David Withers, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
brief_description: Maurie Gervasoni’s grandfather settled in Newstead during the Victorian gold rush in the 1860’s and quickly designed and built a family estate. A love of music and dancing made the Yandoit houses a destination for vibrant country living. The stone house and former stables presently sit as a relic, but Maurie hopes that one day the place will be restored to its former glory.
